p: Insect pests configure one of the major problems of agriculture and human health in urban and rural environments, requiring the use of insecticides for their control. However, the indiscriminate application of these chemicals has led to many environmental problems and resistance to the available compounds has been observed in many species of insects. Resistance and the same potential hazards also arise with acaricides, widely used to control pests that affect livestock ( Fierascu et al., 2019). Thus, research on new pesticides with a lower toxicity to humans, cattle and wildlife, as well as beneficial insects is highly needed.
